name: TheAtlantic
text: Books about Ruth Bader Ginsburg, Clarence Thomas, John Roberts, and others reveal the personalities behind judicial decisions. More from @cray_kate in this week's #TheAtlanticBooksBriefing: https://t.co/g8eWArKyd0

name: TheAtlantic
text: It’s probably best to stay away from your gym for the moment. Here’s why, along with three stories we're following, in the latest Atlantic Daily: https://t.co/XhZvAFD93H

name: TheAtlantic
text: If Amy Coney Barrett's faith "has put limits on her talent and ambition, there are few signs of it; you don’t get a seat on the Seventh Circuit Court of Appeals... so that you can keep your hand in and earn a little pin money," @CaitlinPacific writes: https://t.co/MyaPMJUlvC

name: TheAtlantic
text: More than two centuries after its founding, "the United States stands alone in its handling of lifetime appointments to its highest court, and the drawbacks of a 'superannuated bench' have become ever more clear," @russellberman reports: https://t.co/uW0iN0Q0Dw

name: TheAtlantic
text: Photos of the Week: Autumn colors in Wales, a ripple maze in Taiwan, “picture day” at a Connecticut school, a funnel cloud in Spain, surfing in South Africa, and much more, via @theAtlPhoto: https://t.co/VvZdmgQzny https://t.co/lfoz9sB6nY

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The U.S. cannot serve as a model for the world unless its republican institutions earn their keep," Charles A. Kupchan writes: https://t.co/GbFUtViuI5

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @YasmeenSerhan: As the #Belarus protests enter their seventh consecutive week, I explore how foreign powers can support the Belarusian people without feeding into Lukashenko’s “Western meddling” narrative:

https://t.co/FLLL0xPGj1

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Distance," a new poem by @HieuMinh: "I should be done now, done with it, / the life I wanted before I wanted / it simple." https://t.co/QHSnUuRh5z

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Grief in this country has always had an equity problem, and 2020 has only amplified the issue, as Black deaths have come in back-to-back blows," @marissaaevans writes: https://t.co/g4YR9qiBKq

name: TheAtlantic
